item.title: CDO Confessions Part 2: How to Tell If You’re Set Up to Win?
item.description: In Part 2 of CDO Confessions, we stop glamorizing and start reality checking: are you set up to win or just set up? I share a five-dimension checklist to help you self-assess the true state of your digital playground, governance, culture, tech, power, and value. It’s onion-peeling work (yes, there may be tears), but clarity is power. If you score high, you’re cleared for take-off; if not, time to rethink the flight plan.
